overview: Arjen Pront is co-founder of Mirror42 and responsible for business partnerships and finance. Arjen Pront also co-founded Tornado Insider Group, an Amsterdam-based media company focusing on entrepreneurs and investors throughout the European high growth marketplace. Prior to co-founding Tornado Insider Group, Arjen Pront worked at Hewlett-Packard where he was on the management team of the IT Service Manager Business Unit in the OpenView Division. Arjen Pront was one of the key members in facilitating the integration of PROLIN Automation, B.V., after its acquisition by Hewlett-Packard. Arjen Pront served as a partner in the PROLIN organization. Before his tenure at PROLIN, Arjen Pront was a Director at Bank Mees & Hope in the Netherlands and the U. K. Arjen Pront has served as a member of the Board of Directors for Hyperion Associates, PROLIN Automation and Foundation Software (Ilion Plc), holds a Bachelors degree from HES in Amsterdam and a Masters from Newport University in the USA.
